english.segment1: I never truly lived until I died with You. I never truly lived until I died with You
english.segment2: You came and changed my life. You came to save my life. You turned Your ear and You heard me (Psalm 116:1,2). Why cant I feel what I believe?
english.segment3: Veni sancte Spirtus. Veni sancte Spirtus?
english.segment4: You came and changed my life. You came and saved my life. What can I sing to give you my heart. To give up the things that tear us apart
english.segment5: Who am I that You died for me. Touched my lips and let me sing. Simple words for simple truth. I never lived till I died with. You
english.segment6: I almost forgot. Youre my one, Youre my one good thing (Psalm 16:2). Youre my reason, My reason to sing
english.segment7: I never really lived until I died with You
